blog.name: bnha-omegaverse-rp
blog.title: BNHA Omegaverse Roleplay
blog.description:
A discord omegaverse rp where the students attend a hero college (aged up to 20 yrs old). Must be 20+ to apply.
Info / What's ABO? / Character List / Application

blog.name: papercranecolors
blog.title: Papercranecolors Comissions and Conspiracies
blog.description:
Need a picture? Want specific fanart or your oc drawn in the style of the fandom it's from? You're in the right place!
Feel free to buy me a Ko-fi at 
ko-fi.com/papercranecolors
Check the Comission page to see how to commission a picture and Portfolio to see other pictures I've done.I also think way too much into things and if you click on the Theroies tab, you'll see my many ideas, theroies, and headcanons.

summary: I really like Boku no Hero Academia and since I also wanted to start doing commissions, I killed two birds with one stone and...
caption:
I really like Boku no Hero Academia and since I also wanted to start doing commissions, I killed two birds with one stone and drew myself in the anime’s style! Comments? 

 I feel like I’d have super speed if I had a quirk in real life…

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

summary: Walking in the Shell of a Dead Man
title: Walking in the Shell of a Dead Man
description:
by DocterCaboom

Midoriya is kidnapped by a mad scientist with an Overcharge quirk, who then proceeds to use his quirk on him. This sends both One for All and his secret quirk, Second Chance into overdrive. This forces Midoriya to constantly battle to keep One for All from activating at 100% and also allows Midoriya to “exist” in the world where he died.

Words: 878, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Midoriya Izuku, Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Kirishima Eijirou, Ojiro Mashirao, Kouda Kouji, Kaminari Denki, Jirou Kyouka, Yaoyorozu Momo, Hagakure Tooru, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto, Tokoyami Fumikage, Mineta Minoru, Aoyama Yuuga, Satou Rikidou, Asui Tsuyu, Ashido Mina, Shouji Mezou, Sero Hanta
  • Additional Tags: Out of Character, Work In Progress, I’ll get into the thick of things later on, I just wanted to get this idea out there

This blog is a blog dedicated to the ship Todomomo from the serie My Hero Academia !

summary:
Ejirou: Can't you see I am in distress? What kind of a boyfriend are you?
Katsuki: Look, I am not the boyfriend you call up when...
body:
Ejirou: Can’t you see I am in distress? What kind of a boyfriend are you?

Katsuki: Look, I am not the boyfriend you call up when you need a shoulder to cry on. I am the boyfriend you call when you need a death to look like an accident.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: i think one of the biggest problems with mineta is that the girls are expected to defend themselves against him. I’ve seen some...
body:
i think one of the biggest problems with mineta is that the girls are expected to defend themselves against him. I’ve seen some mineta sympathists argue that he does get punished for his actions, but it’s the girls that are having to punish him when it shouldn’t be their responsibility . Iida is literally the only male that ever tells him he is being disgusting, including teachers, and even that is just played off as comedy. Just once, I would like to see one of the boys punch him in the face.

yeah none of the other character keep him accountable, which makes it seem like the message for readers is “hey boys, you know that guy in class/workplace of yours that’s always harassing girls/women? dont do anything about it.” “hey girls, you know that guy that’s always harassing you? no matter how many times you fight back, no one’s gonna help you. good luck.”

reblog.comment:

yeah none of the other character keep him accountable, which makes it seem like the message for readers is “hey boys, you know that guy in class/workplace of yours that’s always harassing girls/women? dont do anything about it.” “hey girls, you know that guy that’s always harassing you? no matter how many times you fight back, no one’s gonna help you. good luck.”

Iida is literally the only male that ever tells him he is being disgusting, including teachers, and even that is just played off as comedy. Just once, I would like to see one of the boys punch him in the face.
